import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Home.css'; import linkedlnicon from '../../images/linkedlnicon.svg' import githubicon from '../../images/githubicon.svg' import emailicon from '../../images/emailicon.svg' import Lottie from 'lottie-react'; import Navbar from '../../Components/Navbar/Navbar'; import bookanimation from '../../images/mainpageanimation.json' import Signuppop from '../../Components/Popups/Signuppop'; const Home = () => { const [openModal, setOpenModal] = useState(false); return (

The super fast book finder!

Find any book you're looking for or join our community of avid readers.

); } export default Home;
